item.description: Debbie and I will host the next game night at our new house in Pawcatuck.  The first two game nights have been a big success with Cards Against Humanity and Munchkin, but we'd love to expand the repertoire a little, so please bring any games that you would like to play.  If there is a large showing we will split into two groups.  We will serve hors d'oeuvres and beer, please bring any additional food or drink that you'd like!

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Game Night and Housewarming
